metadata.synopsis: AD one liner for when players read Mystic Carrion's letter for the first time, giving some hints that he may know what ailed Oskar and led him to be possessed.
metadata.how_to_trigger: oe LOW_OskarsBeloved_BringOskarHomeGet Father Carrion's letter from the chest and read it.Location: CTY_Main_A -256; 33; -47

0.speaker: Player
0.text: Oskar sought help from Mystic Carrion. Might be worth investigating.
